verses.verse: בָּרֲכִ֥י <S%H1288><s%> ba-ra-Chi Bless נַפְשִׁ֗י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, O my soul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <S%H430><s%> 'E-lo-hai my God גָּדַ֣לְתָּ <S%H1431><s%> ga-Dal-ta great מְּאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; thou art very ה֭וֹד <S%H1935><s%> Hod with honour וְהָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> ve-ha-Dar and majesty לָבָֽשְׁתָּ׃ <S%H3847><s%> la-Va-she-ta. thou art clothed

עֹֽטֶה־ <S%H5844><s%> 'o-teh- Who coverest א֭וֹר <S%H216><s%> or [thyself] with light כַּשַּׂלְמָ֑ה <S%H8008><s%> kas-sal-Mah; as [with] a garment נוֹטֶ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> no-Teh who stretchest out שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> Ma-yim, the heavens כַּיְרִיעָֽה׃ <S%H3407><s%> kay-ri-'Ah. like a curtain

הַ֥מְקָרֶֽה <S%H7136><s%> Ham-ka-reh Who layeth the beams בַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> vam-Ma-yim, in the waters עֲ‍ ֽלִיּ֫וֹתָ֥יו <S%H5944><s%> ali-Yo-Tav of his chambers הַשָּׂם־ <S%H7760><s%> has-som- who maketh עָבִ֥ים <S%H5645><s%> 'a-Vim the clouds רְכוּב֑וֹ <S%H7398><s%> re-chu-Vo; his chariot הַֽ֝מְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ham-hal-Lech, who walketh עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon כַּנְפֵי־ <S%H3671><s%> kan-fei- upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach. of the wind

עֹשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Seh Who maketh מַלְאָכָ֣יו <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chav his angels רוּח֑וֹת <S%H7307><s%> ru-Chot; spirits מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <S%H8334><s%> me-sha-re-Tav, his ministers אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh fire לֹהֵֽט׃ <S%H3857><s%> lo-Het. a flaming

יָֽסַד־ <S%H3254><s%> ya-sad- add אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon מְכוֹנֶ֑יהָ <S%H4349><s%> me-cho-Nei-ha; the foundations בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- that it will not תִּ֝מּ֗וֹט <S%H4131><s%> tim-Mot, [that] it should not be removed עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam forever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever

תְּ֭הוֹם <S%H8415><s%> Te-hom it with the deep כַּלְּב֣וּשׁ <S%H3830><s%> kal-le-Vush as [with] a garment כִּסִּית֑וֹ <S%H3680><s%> kis-si-To; Thou coveredst עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above הָ֝רִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim, above the mountains יַֽעַמְדוּ־ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-du- stood מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. the waters

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- At גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <S%H1606><s%> ga-'a-Ra-te-cha thy rebuke יְנוּס֑וּן <S%H5127><s%> ye-nu-Sun; they fled מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- At ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol at the voice רַֽ֝עַמְךָ֗ <S%H7482><s%> ra-'am-cha, of thy thunder יֵחָפֵזֽוּן׃ <S%H2648><s%> ye-cha-fe-Zun. they hasted

יַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Lu They go up הָ֭רִים <S%H2022><s%> Ha-rim by the mountains יֵרְד֣וּ <S%H3381><s%> ye-re-Du they go down בְקָע֑וֹת <S%H1237><s%> ve-ka-'ot; by the valleys אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְ֝ק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom, unto the place זֶ֤ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh which יָסַ֬דְתָּ <S%H3245><s%> ya-Sad-ta thou hast founded לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem. like

גְּֽבוּל־ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-l-Sa- a bound שַׂ֭מְתָּ <S%H7760><s%> me-ta Thou hast set בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- may not יַֽעֲבֹר֑וּן <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-vo-Run; that they may not pass over בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- they will not יְ֝שׁוּב֗וּן <S%H7725><s%> ye-shu-Vun, that they turn not again לְכַסּ֥וֹת <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-Sot to cover הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

הַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> ham-shal-Le-ach He sendeth מַ֭עְיָנִים <S%H4599><s%> Ma'-ya-nim the springs בַּנְּחָלִ֑ים <S%H5158><s%> ban-ne-cha-Lim; into the valleys בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between הָ֝רִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim, among the hills יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <S%H1980><s%> ye-hal-le-Chun. [which] run

יַ֭שְׁקוּ <S%H8248><s%> Yash-ku They give drink כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- to every חַיְת֣וֹ <S%H2416><s%> chay-To to every beast שָׂדָ֑י <S%H7704><s%> sa-Dai; of the field יִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <S%H7665><s%> yish-be-Ru quench פְרָאִ֣ים <S%H6501><s%> fe-ra-'Im the wild asses צְמָאָֽם׃ <S%H6772><s%> tze-ma-'Am. their thirst

עֲ֭לֵיהֶם <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lei-hem Beside עוֹף־ <S%H5775><s%> 'of- By them shall the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heaven יִשְׁכּ֑וֹן <S%H7931><s%> yish-Kon; have their habitation מִבֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> mib-Bein among עֳ֝פָאיִ֗ם <S%H6073><s%> 'o-fa-Yim, the branches יִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> yit-te-nu- lift קֽוֹל׃ <S%H6963><s%> Kol. up voices

מַשְׁקֶ֣ה <S%H8248><s%> mash-Keh He watereth הָ֭רִים <S%H2022><s%> Ha-rim the hills מֵעֲלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <S%H5944><s%> me-'a-li-yo-Tav; from his chambers מִפְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> mip-pe-Ri with the fruit מַ֝עֲשֶׂ֗יךָ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha, of thy works תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <S%H7646><s%> tis-Ba' is satisfied הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. the earth

מַצְמִ֤יחַ <S%H6779><s%> matz-Mi-ach to grow חָצִ֨יר׀ <S%H2682><s%> cha-Tzir He causeth the grass לַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> lab-be-he-Mah, for the cattle וְ֭עֵשֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> Ve-'e-sev and herb לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <S%H5656><s%> la-'a-vo-Dat for the service הָאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam; of man לְה֥וֹצִיא <S%H3318><s%> le-Ho-tzi that he may bring forth לֶ֝֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, food מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. out of the earth

וְיַ֤יִן׀ <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin And wine יְשַׂמַּ֬ח <S%H8055><s%> ye-sam-Mach [that] maketh glad לְֽבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> le-vav- the heart אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh, of man לְהַצְהִ֣יל <S%H6670><s%> le-hatz-Hil to shine פָּנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nim to make [his] face מִשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> mish-Sha-men; [and] oil וְ֝לֶ֗חֶם <S%H3899><s%> ve-Le-chem, and bread לְֽבַב־ <S%H3824><s%> le-vav- heart אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh man's יִסְעָֽד׃ <S%H5582><s%> yis-'Ad. [which] strengtheneth

יִ֭שְׂבְּעוּ <S%H7646><s%> Yis-be-'u are full עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei The trees יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אַֽרְזֵ֥י <S%H730><s%> 'ar-Zei [of sap] the cedars לְ֝בָנ֗וֹן <S%H3844><s%> le-va-Non, of Lebanon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָטָֽע׃ <S%H5193><s%> na-Ta'. which he hath planted

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-she-ro-Sha- after שָׁ֭ם <S%H8033><s%> m in it צִפֳּרִ֣ים <S%H6833><s%> tzip-po-Rim Where the birds יְקַנֵּ֑נוּ <S%H7077><s%> ye-kan-Ne-nu; make their nests חֲ֝סִידָ֗ה <S%H2624><s%> cha-si-Dah, [as for] the stork בְּרוֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H1265><s%> be-ro-Shim the fir trees בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Tah. [are] her house

הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim hills הַ֭גְּבֹהִים <S%H1364><s%> Hag-ge-vo-him The high לַיְּעֵלִ֑ים <S%H3277><s%> lai-ye-'e-Lim; for the wild goats סְ֝לָעִ֗ים <S%H5553><s%> se-la-'Im, [and] the rocks מַחְסֶ֥ה <S%H4268><s%> mach-Seh [are] a refuge לַֽשְׁפַנִּֽים׃ <S%H8227><s%> Lash-fan-Nim. for the conies

עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah He appointed יָ֭רֵחַ <S%H3394><s%> Ya-re-ach the moon לְמוֹעֲדִ֑ים <S%H4150><s%> le-mo-'a-Dim; for seasons שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> mesh the sun יָדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' knoweth מְבוֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3996><s%> me-vo-'O. his going down

תָּֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7896><s%> ta-shet- Thou makest חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> Cho-shech darkness וִ֣יהִי <S%H1961><s%> Vi-hi becomes לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> La-ye-lah; and it is night בּֽוֹ־ bov- תִ֝רְמֹ֗שׂ <S%H7430><s%> tir-Mos, do creep כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חַיְתוֹ־ <S%H2416><s%> chay-tov- wherein all the beasts יָֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> Ya-'ar. of the forest

הַ֭כְּפִירִים <S%H3715><s%> Hak-ke-fi-rim The young lions שֹׁאֲגִ֣ים <S%H7580><s%> sho-'a-Gim roar לַטָּ֑רֶף <S%H2964><s%> lat-Ta-ref; after their prey וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> u-le-vak-Kesh and seek מֵאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> me-'El from God אָכְלָֽם׃ <S%H400><s%> 'a-che-Lam. their meat

תִּזְרַ֣ח <S%H2224><s%> tiz-Rach ariseth הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> Hash-she-mesh The sun יֵאָסֵפ֑וּן <S%H622><s%> ye-'a-se-Fun; they gather themselves together וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- in מְ֝עוֹנֹתָ֗ם <S%H4585><s%> me-'o-no-Tam, in their dens יִרְבָּצֽוּן׃ <S%H7257><s%> yir-ba-Tzun. and lay them down

יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze goeth forth אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam Man לְפָעֳל֑וֹ <S%H6467><s%> le-fo-'o-Lo; unto his work וְֽלַעֲבֹ֖דָת֣וֹ <S%H5656><s%> ve-la-'a-Vo-da-To and to his labour עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> 'a-dei- eternity עָֽרֶב׃ <S%H6153><s%> 'A-rev. until the evening

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how רַבּ֬וּ <S%H7231><s%> rab-Bu how manifold מַעֲשֶׂ֨יךָ׀ <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei-cha are thy works יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD כֻּ֭לָּם <S%H3605><s%> Kul-lom all בְּחָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> be-cha-che-Mah in wisdom עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta; hast thou made מָלְאָ֥ה <S%H4390><s%> mal-'Ah is full הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, them all the earth קִנְיָנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7075><s%> kin-ya-Ne-cha. of thy riches

זֶ֤ה׀ <S%H2088><s%> zeh There הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea גָּדוֹל֮ <S%H1419><s%> ga-dOl [So is] this great וּרְחַ֪ב <S%H7342><s%> u-re-Chav and broad יָ֫דָ֥יִם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Da-yim In שָֽׁם־ <S%H8033><s%> sham- which רֶ֭מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> Re-mes wherein [are] things creeping וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein without מִסְפָּ֑ר <S%H4557><s%> mis-Par; innumerable חַיּ֥וֹת <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yot beasts קְ֝טַנּ֗וֹת <S%H6996><s%> ke-tan-Not, both small עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot. and great

שָׁ֭ם <S%H8033><s%> m There אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <S%H591><s%> o-ni-Yot the ships יְהַלֵּכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> ye-hal-le-Chun; There go לִ֝וְיָתָ֗ן <S%H3882><s%> liv-ya-Tan, [there is] that leviathan זֶֽה־ <S%H2088><s%> zeh- which יָצַ֥רְתָּ <S%H3335><s%> ya-Tzar-ta [whom] thou hast made לְשַֽׂחֶק־ <S%H7832><s%> le-sa-chek- to play בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

כֻּ֭לָּם <S%H3605><s%> Kul-lom all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha about יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן <S%H7663><s%> ye-sab-be-Run; These wait לָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet all upon thee that thou mayest give אָכְלָ֣ם <S%H400><s%> 'a-che-Lam [them] their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H6256><s%> be-'it-To. in due season

תִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten [That] thou givest לָ֭הֶם <S%H1992><s%> La-hem they יִלְקֹט֑וּן <S%H3950><s%> yil-ko-Tun; them they gather תִּפְתַּ֥ח <S%H6605><s%> tif-Tach thou openest יָֽ֝דְךָ֗ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-cha, thine hand יִשְׂבְּע֥וּן <S%H7646><s%> yis-be-'Un they are filled טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> Tov. with good

תַּסְתִּ֥יר <S%H5641><s%> tas-Tir Thou hidest פָּנֶיךָ֮ <S%H6440><s%> pa-nei-Cha thy face יִֽבָּהֵ֫ל֥וּן <S%H926><s%> yib-ba-He-Lun they are troubled תֹּסֵ֣ף <S%H622><s%> to-Sef thou takest away ר֭וּחָם <S%H7307><s%> Ru-chom their breath יִגְוָע֑וּן <S%H1478><s%> yig-va-'Un; they die וְֽאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to עֲפָרָ֥ם <S%H6083><s%> 'a-fa-Ram to their dust יְשׁוּבֽוּן׃ <S%H7725><s%> ye-shu-Vun. and return

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> te-shal-Lach Thou sendest ר֭וּחֲךָ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-cha-cha forth thy spirit יִבָּרֵא֑וּן <S%H1254><s%> yib-ba-re-'Un; they are created וּ֝תְחַדֵּ֗שׁ <S%H2318><s%> u-te-chad-Desh, and thou renewest פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the face אֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> 'a-da-Mah. of the earth

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi endure כְב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> che-Vod The glory יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; shall endure for ever יִשְׂמַ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> yis-Mach shall rejoice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּמַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Sav. in his works
